alert.note: Alert for East Honolulu; Honolulu Metro; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Leeward; Molokai Leeward South; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 06 at 3:21AM HST until November 06 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF KAUAI OAHU MAUI COUNTY AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH THIS EVENING.. .Strong high pressure building to the north of the islands will drive windy trades through this evening. Winds are expected to increase this afternoon over the western half of the state as an area of stronger winds is ushered in behind a dissipating front. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...East winds increasing to 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph by this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of Kauai, Molokai and Oahu. The strongest winds are expected over and downwind of mountains as well as through valleys. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down tree branches, blow away tents and unsecured objects, and make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
